text: CKTP-FM is a Canadian radio station in Fredericton, New Brunswick which goes by the name of "Rock 'n' Blues 95.7 The Wolf". The station broadcasts a mix of roots rock and blues from its studios on the St. Mary's First Nation, at an FM frequency of 95.7 MHz.Decision CRTC 2001-355 ==References== ==External links== *95.7 The Wolf * * Ktp Ktp Ktp Category:Radio stations established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in New Brunswick
title: CKTP-FM
